projects.title: Game console
projects.briefDescription: Simple game console made from scratch
detailedDescription: The console was created as part of a student competition named shitty party games. It can host up to 6 players and it be used to play multiple different Reactions games and Memmory.

It features a 3D printed shell and buttons, integrating seven segment display to displaying game modes and more LEDs for enhancing interactivity. There are 6 buttons, so there can be from 2 to 6 players playing simultaniously.
The design is a bit 'shitty' on purpose as to fit the category, and it gives ut some charm.

projects.title: Autonomous Drone
detailedDescription: The autonomus drone is a project i am working on right now. It will be able to navigate navigate through the world without colliding into objects.
It has stereo cameras and will use computer vision algorithms to construct a course 3D reconstruction of the world around it.
